name: bankingminimalapp
description: ## Overview This is a web banking application where users can sign up, sign in, validate their phone number using a one-time passcode sent by SMS/Email, view their balance and transaction history, and transfer money to other users. The application will be built with **React** for the frontend, **Node.js** for the server, and **MongoDB** as the database. **Twilio** will be used for SMS-based phone number validation, and the project will be hosted on a platform of your choice.
